local_intent: Ensure the T-block is perceived, align to it, set yaw to 90°, execute a 0.1 m push at 0° (right), then re-align to verify/correct drift.
coherence_with_global: Implements one push cycle from the GLOBAL_BT: ensure visibility (or detect), approach and align, set yaw=90, push 0.1 at 0°, and re-align for verification before next steps.
